message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and collaborative. I've formed genuine connections with many of you, finding common ground while respecting our differences. 

While P6 is certainly deserving, I believe my approach of balancing honesty with strategy represents the spirit of this game. I've never targeted anyone without reason, always trying to make decisions that balanced self-preservation with fairness.

I would be honored to have your vote, and regardless of the outcome, I've appreciated getting to know each of you through this experience.

To the jury, I've shown resilience and adaptability throughout this game. I've navigated challenges and made strategic decisions to stay in the game. P8 has been a formidable opponent, but I believe my consistent performance and ability to outlast others make me the better choice to win. Keep me, and you'll be voting for a player who has earned their spot through skill and perseverance.
